_header: Father and Son and Holy Ghost all one

HerefordO414.Transcription:
ffadur & zone & holy gost al oneSaue me & kepe me from
                    alle fone
HerefordO414.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.446.
